info.title: Information
info.description:
Servers: $SERVER_COUNT
Latency: $LATENCY ms
Items: $ITEM_COUNT
Developed by: Altrius#0420
Version: $VERSION

[Invite Link](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=752258474695590019&permissions=289792&scope=bot) (discord.com)

search.title: Search Results
search.footer:
These prices are not indicative of current trade value, they are averages over a 3 month period.
Please keep this in mind.

descriptions.moreThan9: Your search for `$SEARCH_TERM` returned $RESULT_COUNT results, showing results 1 - 9.

credits.description: These awesome people are all the ones you should really be thanking for making this bot possible, without their help, feedback, and suggestions this bot would not be anywhere close to as good as it has become.

field3.title: Backend:
field3.description: The whole 42Bytes team for having an amazing API for me to draw data from.

endAlert.title: Price Alert Cancelled
endAlert.description: You will no longer receive price notifications on this item

errors.UserNotSubscribed: You dont have any active price alerts for $ITEM_NAME.
errors.DatabaseError: The database encountered a problem, maybe try again?

startAlert.title: Price Alert Created
startAlert.description: You will begin to receive price notifications on this item

errors.UserNotSubscribed: You already have an active price alert for $ITEM_NAME.
errors.DatabaseError: The database encountered a problem, maybe try again?

unRecognizedPlatform.title: Error
unRecognizedPlatform.description: The platform you specified ($PLATFORM) is not recognized, please try again.

alerts.title: Price Alert! (Beta)
alerts.footer: If you got your item successfully, consider cancelling your price alert to stop future messages like this
alerts.description:
Your price alert on the $ITEM_NAME has been triggered!

Contact the $BUYER_FORMATTED with the following message:

`/whisper $INGAME_NAME Hi! I $WTS-B $ITEM_NAME for $PRICE :platinum: (Powered by: Vapor Trader)`

multiUserAlert.title: WARNING
multiUserAlert.singular: You are competing against approximately 1 other person for this price alert.
multiUserAlert.plural: You are competing against approximately $OTHER_SUBSCRIBERS other people for this price alert.
